modName: Hellcommanders TR Basic Needs and RWS Patch
summary: My own simple patch so Real Wildlife - Skyrim food items can effect hunger level etc with TRO_BasicNeeds
descriptionHtml:
Name: Hellcommander\'s TR-Basic Needs & RWS Patch
Version:
Date: 4/17/2012
Category: Miscellaneous
Requirements: Player-Created MOD(s): Real Wildlife Skyrim 0.1.esp and TRO_BasicNeeds.esp
Author(s): Patch made by Hellcommander711
Source:

Description
===========
My own simple patch so Real Wildlife - Skyrim food items can effect hunger level etc with TRO_BasicNeeds


Details
=======
Of changes food items for Real Wildlife as following:
Raw Bear Meat (FORMID RWSFoodBearMeat) changed have raw food effect
Cooked Bear Meat (formid RWSFoodDisBearMeatCooked) median food filling food
Raw Diseased Bear Meat (was called Raw Bear Meat renamed to reduce confusion)(FORMID RWSFoodDisBearMeat) removed healing effect, added raw food effect, added damage health effect 2 pts for 60 seconds til I can create a good script effect to give player random disease.
Raw Diseased Saber Cat Meat (was called Raw Saber Cat Meat renamed to reduce confusion)(FORMID RWSFoodDisSaberCatMeat) removed healing effect, added raw food effect, added damage health effect 2 pts for 60 seconds til I can create a good script effect to give player random disease.
Diseased Wolf Meat (was called Raw Wolf Meat renamed to reduce confusion)(FORMID RWSFoodDisSaberCatMeat) removed healing effect, added raw food effect, added damage health effect 2 pts for 60 seconds til I can create a good script effect to give player random disease.
Roasted Dog Meat (FORMID RWSFoodDogCooked) replaced effect with medium meal effect
Elsweyr Stew replaced effects with medium meal effect
Hunter\'s Hotpot (formid RWSFoodHuntersStew) replaced restore stamina part of effect with Filling meal effect since it sounds like it has alot of things in it.
fox meat = raw
fox meat cooked = medium
raw Giant meat = raw
Cooked Giant meat = put at medium to be similiar to mammoth
Grouse Breast = raw
Grouse Breast cooked = light
raw hawk meat = raw
cooked hawk meat = light (hawks in Skyrim are small)
raw mammoth meat = raw
cooked mammoth meat = medium (same as effect as basic needs adds)
raw saber meat = raw
cooked saber cat meat = medium
tripe stew = medium
raw wolf meat = raw
cooked wolf meat = medium (I have heard online that wolf meat tastes very bad though :P)

If authors of mods this makes match want me to take down I will.
Plans:
Make it possible for actor that eats diseased meat to have chance of catching disease from that the creature can pass.
This is not the patch released by Shiek200.
This is a patch I created by self.

1.Extract somewhere
2.Place in your data folder of Skyrim
3.Use your favorite modding tool to place after TR-Basic Needs & Real wildlife in the following order:
Real Wildlife Skyrim 0.1.esp
TRO_BasicNeeds.esp
TR-Basic Needs & RWS Patch.esp

Uninstall
=========
1. Uncheck TR-Basic Needs & RWS Patch.esp with whatever mod manager you use.
2. Delete the files/folders associated with the mod.



Upgrade
=======
Only changes effect so if I ever change the mod their shouldn\'t be any problems I aim for mods I make to have the least conflicts and problems I can.

Incompatibility
===============
Incompatible with any mod that changes the food/potion category items added by Real Wildlife Skyrim.

Known Issues or Bugs
====================
No issues at time of writing that I know of.

History
=======
1.0, 04/18/12- Initial release.

Contact
=======
Post any comments on the comment section.

Credits
=======
All credits for content go to Nedius (author of Real Wildlife - Skyrim) and author of (Total Realism - Basic Needs)

Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim.
Thanks to TESNexus.com for the a one-stop-shop resource for authors and players.
Thanks to LHammonds for the Readme Generator this file was based on.

Tools Used
==========
7-Zip - http://www.tesnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=15579
Creation Kit
Readme Generator - http://HammondsLegacy.com/obmm/tools_readme_generator1.asp
Wrye Bash - http://wrye.ufrealms.net/Wrye%20Bash.html

Licensing/Legal
===============
You can do whatever you want with this mod but don\'t complain to me if it
doesn\'t work or your PC blows up.
Any of the mod authors of the 2 mods it uses to patch can place on their mod page and maintain if they want.
author: Patch Created by Hellcommander711
